affirm.description: is the intent to affirm something?

deny.description: is the intent to deny something?

dont_know.description: is the intent to say I don’t know?

acknowledge.description: is the intent to acknowledge what was said?

greet.description: is the intent to greet someone?

end_call.description: is the intent to end call or say goodbye?

handoff.description: is the intent to speak to a human or hand off?

thank.description: is the intent to thank someone?

repeat.description: is the intent asking to repeat the previous sentence?

cancel_close_leave_freeze.description: is the intent asking about canceling or closing something?

change.description: is the intent to change or modify something?

make_open_apply_setup_get_activate.description: is the intent to make, open, apply, set up or activate something?

request_info.description: is the intent to ask or request some information?

how.description: is the intent asking how to do something?

why.description: is the intent to ask why something happened or needs to be done?

when.description: is the intent to ask about when or what time something happens?

how_much.description: is the intent asking about some quantity or how much?

how_long.description: is the intent asking about how long something takes?

wrong_notworking_notshowing.description: is the intent asking about something wrong, missing or not working?

lost_stolen.description: is the intent asking about something being lost or stolen?

more_higher_after.description: is the intent to indicate something more, higher, after or increasing?

less_lower_before.description: is the intent to indicate something less, lower, before or decreasing?

new.description: is the intent asking about something new?

existing.description: is the intent asking about something that already exists?

limits.description: is the intent asking about some sort of limit?

refund.description: is the intent to ask about some refund?

check_in.description: is the intent to ask about check in?

check_out.description: is the intent to ask about check out?

restaurant.description: is the intent to ask something related to restaurant?

swimming_pool.description: is the intent to ask something related to the swimming pool?

parking.description: is the intent to ask something related to parking?

pets.description: is the intent to ask something related to pets?

accesibility.description: is the intent to ask something related to accessibility?

booking.description: is the intent to talk about some booking?

wifi.description: is the intent to ask something related to wifi or wireless?

gym.description: is the intent to ask something related to gym?

spa.description: is the intent to ask something related to spa or beauty services?

room_ammenities.description: is the intent to ask something related to some room amenities?

housekeeping.description: is the intent to talk about housekeeping issues?

room_service.description: is the intent to talk about room service?

date.description: What is the specific date mentioned in this sentence?

date_period.description: What is the time period in days, months or years mentioned in this sentence?

date_from.description: What is the start date of some period mentioned in this sentence?

date_to.description: What is the end date of some period mentioned in this sentence?

time.description: What is the specific time in the day mentioned in this sentence?

time_from.description: What is the start time of some time period mentioned in this sentence?

time_to.description: What is the end time of some time period mentioned in this sentence?

time_period.description: What is the time period in hours or minutes mentioned in this sentence?

person_name.description: What is the name of a person mentioned in this sentence?

number.description: What is the number without context mentioned in this sentence?

kids.description: what is the number of kids mentioned in this sentence?

adults.description: what is the number of adults mentioned in this sentence?

people.description: What is the number of people mentioned in this sentence?

rooms.description: What is the number of rooms mentioned in this sentence?
